// frontend/src/components/WeatherAlertCard.jsx
import React,{useState}from'react';import'./Card.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const WeatherAlertCard=_ref=>{let{onSend,readyState}=_ref;const[location,setLocation]=useState('City Center');const[alertType,setAlertType]=useState('heavy_rain');const[severity,setSeverity]=useState(8);const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(onSend){onSend({location,alert_type:alertType,severity});}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"card__title",children:"\uD83C\uDF26\uFE0F Weather Alert"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Location"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"location",value:location,onChange:e=>setLocation(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Alert Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:alertType,onChange:e=>setAlertType(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"heavy_rain",children:"Heavy Rain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"strong_wind",children:"Strong Wind"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"snow_storm",children:"Snow Storm"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"heat_wave",children:"Heat Wave"})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Severity Level (1-10)"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"severity",min:"1",max:"10",value:severity,onChange:e=>setSeverity(parseInt(e.target.value,10))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",disabled:readyState!==1,children:readyState===1?'Send Alert':'Connecting...'})]})]});};export default WeatherAlertCard;
